title: Ep 295 Frankly Speaking: Nike, Foot Locker, Direct TV & The Internet of Everything
itunes:title: Frankly Speaking: Nike, Foot Locker, Direct TV & The Internet of Everything
description:
We start off today with a question on the retail sports shoe space, Nike, Adidas and Foot Locker and Under Armour.
Chris then asks Frank about cable and satellite TV services and if he’s still bullish on Direct TV.
Joe asks Frank about online gaming and the “Internet of everything”.
 Please send in your questions  
 
Plus, Franks brand new website is live at  and his new newsletter Disrupters and Dominators has launched.  to learn more about it.
